Iâ€™m Yishan. I design space in physical and digital worlds.

An architect and urban designer dived in the world of digital creation. Currently working with tech start up founders, engineers and designers to create website, mobile Apps and brand identity.

I was born in China, and spent my adulthood life in New York and Bay area. I went to school for architecture and urban design, but started to grow interest in product design through talking to people and internet. Outside of work you can find me in gym, dancing, and spoil my two cats.

Oakland, California

2022

Southeast Community Center

Design, Construction & Project Management

As one of the major projects I worked on at the City of San Francisco, I was involved in the design, construction administration and project management of the Southeast Community Center in India Basin neighborhood in San Francisco. The project will complete in May 2022.
